text: Ronnie O'Sullivan (born 5 December 1975) is an English professional snooker player. He was born in Wordsley, West Midlands. He grew up in Chigwell, Essex and still lives there. He is the most successful snooker player of all time. Ronnie O'Sullivan made his first century break at age 10. In total he has made more than 1000. He won the World Snooker Championship in 2001, 2004, 2008, 2012, 2013, 2020 and 2022. He has won the UK Championship eight times. This was in 1993, 1997, 2001, 2007, 2014, 2017, 2018 and 2023. He has won the Masters seven times, in 1995, 2005, 2007, 2009, 2014, 2016 and 2017. == Other websites == *Official website Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Essex Category:Sportspeople from West Midlands (county) Category:English snooker players
title: Ronnie O'Sullivan
